item.title: Useful linux commands
item.description:
These are some useful commands that I use for everday working with linux

 du -hs .[^.]* * | sort -h

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description:
After a long time I decided to update my github blog. The previous version has a simple static html/css website.

I decided to try something different and I will try to experiment with Hugo.

item.title: About
item.description:
I was born in Athens and raised on a nearby island. I earned my Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science from the University of Thessaly in Greece.

For the past 12 years, I have been working as a PHP developer at the University of Erlangen-NÃ¼rnberg.
